titles.title: Reforming, Expanding, and Simplifying Investment for Local Infrastructure to Enhance our Neighborhoods and Towns Act
Reforming, Expanding, and Simplifying Investment for Local Infrastructure to Enhance our Neighborhoods and Towns Act
RESILIENT Act
RESILIENT Act
RESILIENT Act
A bill to provide for the improvement of rural infrastructure in the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
